Sotr.How: We explain how we will cooperate
Sotr.title1: Full cycle of mobile application development
Sotr.description1: From idea to implementation — we engage in mobile application development for iOS and Android. We create intuitive and highly effective applications that attract users and help your business reach new heights
Sotr.description2: We develop unique and appealing designs for both mobile applications and accompanying websites. Our goal is to make your application and website visually attractive and user-friendly
Sotr.description3: Create the perfect online presence for your mobile application. We develop responsive websites that look great on all devices and effectively showcase your application
Sotr.description4: We ensure seamless integration between your mobile application and website. This includes data synchronization, the ability to log in via the website, and interaction between the two platforms
Sotr.description5: Increase the visibility of your application in search engines with our SEO services. We optimize your website to attract the target audience and ensure better promotion of your application online
Sotr.description6: We provide support and maintenance services for your applications and websites. We also implement analytics systems so you can track performance, analyze user behavior, and gain valuable insights to improve your product

case1.title: Website for a Shopping Center
case1.description: We are pleased to present our new project — a modern and interactive website for the shopping center 'Dobrynya'. As part of this project, our team worked on creating a unique online platform that not only reflects the style and atmosphere of the shopping center but also provides a convenient interface for its visitors

case11.title: Website for Shopping Center
case11.description: We developed a modern and interactive website that conveys the atmosphere and style of the shopping center, and also becomes a convenient digital assistant for its visitors.

case12.title: Functionality
case12.description: The website presents detailed information about stores and services located in 'Dobrynya'. Visitors can easily learn about current promotions, discounts and special offers. An interactive floor plan has been implemented, allowing you to quickly find the right store or recreation area. To increase audience engagement, we introduced a news and events section where announcements of upcoming events are published. Responsive design ensures comfortable use on smartphones, tablets and computers.

case13.title: Admin Panel
case13.description: A separate admin panel was created, with the help of which shopping center employees can independently update store data, edit promotions and add news without contacting developers.

case2.title: Website for NGO SYNERGY
case2.description: We developed an intuitive interface and rich functionality that allows users to easily access information, participate in activities, and interact with the organization. We aimed to create a space that not only reflects the values and mission of 'SYNERGY' but also fosters deeper engagement and interaction

case21.title: Website for NGO SYNERGY
case21.description:
We created a modern and convenient web resource that helps the organization effectively communicate its mission and values to the audience.
The interface is designed so that any visitor - whether a volunteer, partner or person seeking help - can quickly find the necessary information and engage in the organization's activities.

case22.title: Functionality
case22.description: The website includes sections with current news and events where users can always be aware of the organization's plans and events. The ability to register and participate in online activities has been implemented, which allows attracting new volunteers and project participants. For convenient communication, we added integration with feedback forms and newsletter subscription so that users can receive important information directly to their email. All functionality is available on any device thanks to responsive design, which ensures comfortable interaction with the site both on computers and smartphones.

case23.title: Admin Panel
case23.description: A separate convenient admin panel was developed, which allows NGO employees to independently manage content: publish news, update information about events, process applications and monitor user activity statistics.

case3.title: Corporate Taxi
case3.description: Our new project — a corporate taxi designed to improve the internal logistics of the company. A user-friendly interface and high functionality

case31.title: Corporate Taxi
case31.description:
We developed a mobile application for corporate taxi that allows employees to quickly and conveniently get home after work. The service works on the principle of 'like in Yandex.Taxi', but adapted to the internal tasks of the company.

In the application, the employee specifies the address and time of car delivery, after which they immediately see information about the assigned driver and arrival time. The driver receives the order, confirms it and sees the optimal route on the map. The dispatcher controls the movement of cars in real time and reassigns trips if necessary.

For communication between the employee and driver, a built-in chat is implemented, and automatic order distribution, real-time geolocation and analytics allow reducing waiting time and optimizing fleet usage.

case4.title: Online Knife Store
case4.description: Our new project is an online platform for selling knives with registration, online payment, and delivery across Russia

case41.title: Task
case41.description: Create a full-featured trading platform for selling knives with modern technology stack, convenient admin panel for managing orders, creating products, controlling payment status and secure online payments.

case42.title: Technical Solution
case42.description:
The project is built on a modern technology stack that ensures high performance, load resistance and ease of further support.
On the frontend, we used Next.js 14 with App Router, strict TypeScript typing, as well as Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui to create a stylish and responsive interface. Forms are implemented through React Hook Form, and state management is handled with Zustand.
The backend is built on NestJS using Prisma ORM and PostgreSQL database, and AWS S3 is used for file storage. Security is ensured through JWT authentication.

case43.title: Online Payment through YuKassa
case43.description: The YuKassa payment system is integrated into the platform, which supports all popular payment methods: bank cards, SBP, e-wallets, Apple Pay and Google Pay. We implemented secure transaction processing via HTTPS protocol and used payment verification mechanisms through the YuKassa API. The system automatically processes payment statuses - from 'pending' to 'successfully completed' - and instantly notifies the client of the result. Thanks to this, the user gets a seamless payment experience, and the platform owner gets a transparent and reliable payment acceptance system.

case5.title: Telegram Bot for Gazprom Neft
case5.description: Intelligent bot for training employees of subsidiaries. Adaptive testing system, daily knowledge checks and detailed effectiveness analytics. Implemented in corporate training blocks.

case51.title: Project goal - daily learning without unnecessary control.
case51.description: We created a Telegram bot that replaces the internal LMS: adaptive tests, competency-based questions, learning without browser access. An employee completes 3-5 questions per day directly in the chat.

case52.title: Flexibility for departments and roles.
case52.description: The bot takes into account the organization's structure: different scenarios for SUOD and corporate blocks. Managers see statistics by groups, and employees see their progress. Support for multiple directions within one tool

case53.title: Implementation Results.
case53.description: Testing now takes place daily instead of once a year. Residual knowledge increased to 98%. HR receives detailed reports and learning control without manual work.

case6.title: SEO and Yandex.Direct for VOSVOD
case6.description: Our new project is an online platform for selling knives with registration, online payment and delivery across Russia

case61.title: Goal: attract traffic and applications for GIMS and training
case61.description: VOSVOD trains rescuers and owners of small vessels. We promoted their courses through SEO and launched advertising campaigns in Yandex.Direct, focusing on hot demand (GIMS, boat license, yachting).

case62.title: SEO: top positions with high competition
case62.description: We optimized pages, conducted semantic core, wrote texts for queries. Already after 2 months, course pages reached the top-5 in regions, surpassing even federal sites.

case63.title: Contextual advertising with focus on ROI
case63.description: We set up Yandex.Direct with CPL up to 220 ₽. We allocated separate campaigns for each category of courses, taking into account seasonality and target audience behavior. ROI - 6.3x at the first stage.

case7.title: Asleep.online - platform for healthy sleep
case7.description: We created an innovative system that combines AI sleep diagnostics, doctor recommendations and solution selection - from online consultations to courses and gadgets.

case71.title: Personalized recommendations
case71.description: The platform analyzes responses in a free survey, identifies possible sleep disorders and offers a personal improvement plan - from changing habits to contacting a specialist.

case72.title: Access to the best specialists and products
case72.description: We united clinics, psychologists, equipment manufacturers and online courses for comprehensive sleep problem solving. The user receives only proven and effective tools.

case73.title: AI and medicine in one product
case73.description: We use artificial intelligence algorithms to assess sleep quality and identify problems. Data is integrated with gadgets and medical services for maximum accuracy.

Maintenance.text-2: We are carrying out technical work. Please visit the site later or open it on your computer

Website.text-2: We will create an effective website for you that will work correctly in all browsers and on all devices
Website.description: Sign the NDA. We study the terms of reference. If you don't have one, we send you a website development brief and help you fill it out
Website.description-2: Conduct business intelligence. We study technical documentation. Calculate how much time will be required for development and testing. Identify undescribed scenarios and bottlenecks in the TOR
Website.description-3: We do the layout, develop the website and populate it with content
Website.description-4: With the help of our QA engineers, who were involved in the project at the start, we test the site. We work out the test documentation. We make final edits
Website.stage-5: We present to you the website
Website.description-5: We hand you the site and a complete package of project documents
Website.description-6: Once the rights to the site have been transferred, its history does not end. If the first months of the site's life show where and what needs to be finished or redone, we offer two options: conclude a maintenance contract or start a new phase of development
Website.p: Trust our professionals and get a quality product!

Writeus.p: Let's make a user-friendly digital product for your customers together!
Writeus.p2: By clicking on the button, you consent to the processing of personal data and agree to the privacy policy

Mobile.h2: An app for iOS and Android at once? Let's develop it on Flutter
Mobile.p: With cross-platform mobile development, we can cover two operating systems at once with one code: iOS and Android. Firstly, it is profitable, because development costs are significantly optimised. And secondly, it is fast - cross-platform development allows you to reduce the time required to create an application by 40%
Mobile.description: We sign the NDA. We study your terms of reference (TOR), and if you don't have one - this happens too, and it's normal - we help you draw one up. By the beginning of the second stage, we have a description of the basic functions of the mobile application
Mobile.stage-2: Estimating the scope of work and selecting a methodology
Mobile.description-2: Select a methodology suitable for the project: Agile or Waterfall. Study the technical documentation. Then we calculate the estimated development and testing time. Identify undescribed scenarios in the ToR. Plan a roadmap
Mobile.description-3: Following a clear roadmap, working in sprints
Mobile.stage-4: Designing the design of the application
Mobile.description-4: We create a screen map, graphic elements and a detailed (static or interactive) prototype with possible usage scenarios in mind
Mobile.description-5: We get feedback from the business analyst and the client, incorporate comments and make edits
Mobile.description-6: We connect the development team, which writes the code. At this time, the designer actively monitors the work and checks how the screens are implemented. The work is done in iterations - we develop a part of the functionality, test it, and continue working on the rest of the functions
Mobile.stage-7: Testing the app and fixing bugs
Mobile.description-7: With the help of our QA engineers, who were involved in the project at the start, we test the site. We work out test documentation. Before releasing the application, we do acceptance testing: we go through the business cases of the application
Mobile.description-8: Add the app to the app shops - App Store, Google Play or any other shop of your choice. Important point: in order for the app to pass the review of storers, you can ask developers for help in the release, or you can prepare and upload the app to the shop yourself
Mobile.description-9: Once a mobile app is published, its story doesn't end. We work on new features, improve it, and get feedback from users
Mobile.description-10: A ready-made easily extensible and maintainable mobile application published in the App Store/Google Play. As well as the source code of the application and its documentation
Mobile.text3: Trust our professionals and get a quality product!

cover.title:
We build mobile apps
with Flutter

blockText.title: What is Flutter?
blockText.p1: Flutter is a cross-platform app development technology. Developed and maintained by Google and constantly updated. Flutter allows building apps for two OSes at once using a single codebase. For users, a Flutter app feels native. For business — many advantages.
blockText.p2: Flutter is used by Alibaba, Philips Hue, Hamilton, Tencent, Grab, Groupon, DIXY Group, Yandex.Drive and other major global and Russian companies

benefit.title: Benefits of building apps with Flutter for business

cost.title: Lower cost
cost.description: Budget savings of 30% to 50% on average. You don't pay for two separate projects as with native solutions

speed.title: Higher speed
speed.description: Reduced time to market. One Flutter developer can handle tasks of two native developers in the same timeframe

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Users won't notice the difference from native - Flutter apps work fast and efficiently

functionality.title: Functionality
functionality.description: Flutter apps are built for retail, banking, insurance and other businesses without limitations

cover.title: When is a Next.js framework website useful?
cover.subtitle: Building websites with Next allows customers to get a modern, comfortable web resource that's easy to use and manage, with everything needed to achieve their business goals

benefits.title: Next.js website development is suitable for implementing the following internet projects:

projects.title: E-commerce websites
projects.description: Development of modern and functional e-commerce websites to increase sales and buyer convenience. We create platforms with adaptive design, payment system integration and analytics, as well as support for user scenarios for better brand interaction

projects.title: Online stores
projects.description: Creation of online stores with intuitive interface, optimized for shopping convenience and product management. We offer payment system integration, analytics tools and adaptive design to attract and retain customers

projects.title: Internet portals
projects.description: Development of internet portals for informing and interacting with a wide audience. We create functional platforms with convenient navigation, multimedia content support, social media integration and scalability for any tasks

projects.title: Media resources
projects.description: Creation of media resources for publishing and distributing content. We develop platforms with optimized management system, adaptive design, analytics integration and tools for attracting and retaining audience

projects.title: Online forums
projects.description: Creation of online forums for active communication and information exchange between users. We implement convenient moderation features, multimedia publishing capabilities, as well as notification and search systems to maintain interest and activity on the platform

pricing.title: Need an accurate cost estimate?
pricing.subtitle: Send us your requirements, and our specialists will calculate the final project price. You'll get a complete work plan including timelines and development costs

items.title: Requirements Development
items.description: We write detailed technical requirements (TR) including website functionality, additional options and development prospects. This is a key document used by all specialists throughout development

items.title: Interface Design
items.description: We design UX/UI interface using the Next.js framework. All design elements are oriented towards the target audience, allowing us to create a convenient and attractive interface for users

items.title: Custom Design Preparation
items.description: We create original design that matches the client's corporate style. Attention to detail and individual solutions allow us to create a unique website style that advantageously distinguishes the project from competitors

items.title: Programming Component Development
items.description: After preparing the design, we proceed with development. We use Next.js to create efficient and functional websites with optimized code and scalability capabilities

items.title: Mobile Device Adaptation
items.description: We optimize the website for mobile devices so it remains functional and fast on any screen, ensuring excellent user experience on phones and tablets

items.title: Website Testing
items.description: We conduct thorough testing of all website elements: from functionality to usability. We fix all identified errors to ensure stable website operation

items.title: Project Launch and Promotion
items.description: We launch the project and work on its promotion. We develop a marketing strategy that helps attract the target audience and increase website traffic. We provide technical support and project development

cover.title: Mobile app and website design
cover.subtitle: We design effective interfaces
cover.description: We develop interactive interface layouts. This is needed if you have a product idea and want to see a functional UX prototype that solves your business tasks.

items.description: We connect the team: project manager (PM), designer and business analyst.
PM together with business analyst and designer clarify your wishes for project functionality and compile a list of their priority levels.
Together with you, we determine from 5 to 7 most likely scenarios for using the application.

Based on your wishes, the designer creates wireframes, develops the style of the future application, creates screens in Figma and an interactive prototype, prepares all layouts for transfer to the developer. The analyst checks the layouts for compliance with requirements.
We coordinate layouts with you. We make edits (up to three iterations).
We present you with an interactive prototype in Figma.
